Flac (MSVC)

Download

  • Download http://prdownloads.sourceforge.net/flac/flac-1.1.1.tar.gz?download

Project

  • Open %SOURCE_HOME%/FLAC.dsw

Project Options

  • For libFLAC_static and libFLAC++_static:
    • C/C++, Code Generation, Runtime library : Multi-threaded
    • C/C++, Language, wchar_t : Yes
  • If you don't have NASM, for libFLAC_static:
    • C/C++, Preprocessor : suppress FLAC__HAS_NASM
    • In the project, delete /Source Files/Assembly Files (IA32)

Compile

  • Build libFLAC++_static, Release

Install

  • Copy %SOURCE_HOME%/include/FLAC to Shared/Include/Flac
  • Copy %SOURCE_HOME%/include/FLAC++ to Shared/Include/Flac++
  • Copy libFLAC_static.lib to Shared/Library/MSVC/Flac.lib
  • Copy libFLAC++_static.lib to Shared/Library/MSVC/Flac++.lib

In your project

  • C/C++, Preprocessor : FLAC__NO_DLL;VERSION=\"1.1.1\"
